snippet.title: Meet the Heroes of Shining Resonance Refrain
snippet.description:
A band’s music is only as good as its members and your team in Shining Resonance Refrain is no different. Carrying the powerful weapon/instruments called Armonics, each hero can devastate your enemies with a powerful melody. Get to know more about each of the playable characters who’ll perform in the B.A.N.D. (Battle Anthem of the Noble Dragoneers) in our latest trailer.

Shining Resonance Refrain launches on July 10 on PS4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and PC. Pre-order your copy today at shiningresonance.com
